snippet: Jerry Sandusky’s adopted son Matthew said in a television interview that his father’s sexual abuse of him had included oral sex, a more serious allegation than he made to detectives two years ago.
abstract: Jerry Sandusky’s adopted son Matthew says in television interview that his father’s sexual abuse of him had included oral sex, more serious allegation than he made to detectives two years earlier.
lead_paragraph: Jerry Sandusky’s adopted son Matthew said in a television interview that his father’s sexual abuse of him had included oral sex, a more serious allegation than he made to detectives two years ago.
